name: Auto Car Driving: City Crime
description:
Auto Car Driving: City Crime is a new, thrill-filled, exciting street racing car game. Amazingly 3D vehicle models, ranging from super fast sports to huge armored army trucks; Each with their own unique statistics to give you the choice to do the robbery!
FEATURES:
- Highly detailed sports cars, modeled perfectly to look like the real models!
- Expansive Open City Environment
- Customize your weapons and vehicles to how you like!
- Realistic car driving, experience true driving simulation
- Car damage physics
